headers.value: default-src 'self' https://telegram.org https://oauth.telegram.org; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://telegram.org; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://telegram.org; img-src 'self' data: https://telegram.org; frame-src 'self' https://oauth.telegram.org; connect-src 'self' https://oauth.telegram.org https://telegram.org;
